spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout deviation. The 3D render represents a significantly smaller 1-bedroom or studio configuration, whereas the floor plan is a 3-BHK unit. Internal wall alignment and room adjacencies from the original plan are largely ignored.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing multiple rooms (2 bedrooms, 2 toilets, utility area, and balconies). While the model is floating on a dark background and has no text labels, it fails to represent the actual structure of the provided plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is clean and block-style, but placement does not correspond to the layout in the floor plan (e.g., dining table and kitchen counter locations are completely changed).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to stylistic constraints. Uses low-poly geometry, flat shading, isometric orthographic camera, and is free of textures and photorealism.

detected_errors.description: Missing two bedrooms, two toilets, utility room, and both balconies present in the 2D plan.
Kitchen and dining areas are misplaced and distorted relative to the entrance and living room.
The generator hallucinated a generic small apartment layout instead of following the logic of the complex 3-BHK footprint.
